snippet: Bank of America on Friday won a federal judge’s approval for a $2.43 billion settlement with investors who said the lender hid crucial information when it bought Merrill Lynch.
abstract: Bank of America wins approval from Federal District Judge P Kevin Castel in Manhattan for a $2.43 billion settlement with investors who said the lender hid crucial information when it purchased Merrill Lynch.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America on Friday won a federal judge’s approval for a $2.43 billion settlement with investors who said the lender hid crucial information when it bought Merrill Lynch.
